alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 12:50PM EDT until August 12 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... Northeastern Cuyahoga County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Lake County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 130 PM EDT. * At 1250 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cleveland Heights, or near Cleveland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Chardon, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Solon, Warrensville Heights, South Russell, Burton, Highland Hills, Chesterland, Garfield Heights, Shaker Heights, Maple Heights, South Euclid, Mayfield Heights, East Cleveland, Lyndhurst, University Heights, Bedford and Wickliffe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Ohio.
